snippet: As the sun becomes almost predatory, the conversation this year suggests this may be more than a temporary discomfort.
abstract: Editorial comments on the seemingly predatory nature of the sun as a heat wave punishes New York and the East, like it did the West; suggests that changing climate is prompting conversations about weather that are different in tone than in years past.
lead_paragraph: As the sun becomes almost predatory, the conversation this year suggests this may be more than a temporary discomfort.
